tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  avatar_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE custom_avatars (
    avatar_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    avatar_name VARCHAR(50),
    avatar_model BYTEA,
    avatar_owner_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_environments (
    environment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    environment_name VARCHAR(50),
    environment_description TEXT,
    environment_owner_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    player_id INT,
    activity_details JSON,
    activity_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    score_value INT,
    score_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE game_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_name VARCHAR(50),
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    session_start TIMESTAMP,
    session_end TIMESTAMP
);
